mapper.select: SELECT id, title, dts_type, cur_state, cur_user, project_id FROM tbl_dts
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_dts (title, dts_type, cur_state, cur_user, project_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{dtsType}, #{curState}, #{curUser}, #{projectId})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_dts SET title = #{title}, dts_type = #{dtsType}, cur_state = #{curState}, cur_user = #{curUser}, project_id = #{projectId} WHERE id = #{id}
